dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Billionaire Steven Cohen Sells Apple Stock and Buys a Little-Known AI Stock Up 500% in Less Than 3 Years
News Content: Billionaire Steven Cohen Sells Apple Stock and Buys a Little-Known AI Stock Up 500% in Less Than 3 Years

Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

Do not include any additional explanations outside of the JSON object.```json
{
"reasoning": "The news reports that billionaire Steven Cohen has sold Apple stock and invested in a lesser-known AI stock. This could be interpreted as a lack of confidence in Apple's future performance or a strategic shift towards high-growth sectors like AI. Such high-profile sell-offs can influence market sentiment, potentially leading to negative perceptions among other investors. However, Apple's stock is highly liquid and widely held, so the impact might be muted unless this triggers a broader trend.",
"company_name": "Apple Inc.",
"company_symbol": "AAPL",
"news_headline": "Billionaire Steven Cohen Sells Apple Stock and Buys a Little-Known AI Stock Up 500% in Less Than 3 Years",
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.3,
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.5
}
```
